title: The Stones in the park
brief_description: The phenomenon of the rock concert is explored in this film of the Rolling Stones concert in Hyde Park, London 1969, a few days after the death Brian Jones. Includes interviews and behind-the-scenes footage. Photographed by Bill Brayne, Michael Dudds and Brian Grainger.
